Droid G2 - Gnutella 2 client on Android

Droid G2 - Gnutella 2 client on Android

This project is maintained by Toxic-Lab

Welcome to Droid G2 - Gnutella 2 client for Android

This android client is presented to you by Toxic-lab (HK). This client makes use of the Sharelin source code as the backbone to communicate with the Gnutella 2 network. Using this android application, client can search and download files, songs, movie directly using their mobile phone. This definitely save your time compare to using Gnutella client on computer and then connect your PC and mobile phone using a USB wire and then transfer the file.

Development

This project was developed initially using Eclipse back in 2009. This project has been reformed to become an IntelliJ IDEA Project. You can download a copy of IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition at https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/download/.

This project makes use of the following open source projects:

  • Sharelin http://sourceforge.net/projects/sharelin/
  • CrystalX for their great C++ compiler https://www.crystax.net/android/ndk
  • Boost library http://www.boost.org

License

Toxic-lab (HK) reserve any copyright of the source code under the folder DroidG2-app. This part is the android user interface we provided to allow user to work with Sharelin on Android. The source code under the folder shoreline-core is licensed under the General Public License version 3.

The code under DroidG2-app is in version 1.0 and it is for demostration purpose only, the latest version 1.1f is kept in private respository.

Support or Contact

Having trouble with this software, you can either fire a bug report through Android and write sufficient information to help us debugging or drop us an email through kongutoxiclab@gmail.com
